title: Stay Foundations & Focus
summary: Introduce the concept of staying put and building focus around mild distractions.

lessons.title: Stay — Foundations
lessons.objective: Puppy learns to hold position briefly with you nearby.
steps: Ask for Sit. Open palm signal and say 'Stay'.
Add tiny distance (half step) and reset.
supportGuidelines: If breaking: shorten time/distance, reward more often.
Use a release cue like 'Free!' consistently.
lessons.safetyNotes: Avoid long sessions; end before frustration.

lessons.title: Recall 2 — Indoors with Distance
lessons.objective: Strengthen response with slightly longer distances indoors.
steps: Say name + 'Come!' once; jog backwards 2–3 steps.
Reward at your feet; scatter 2–3 treats for fun reset.
supportGuidelines: If slow: use higher-value treats and enthusiastic praise.
Avoid calling when likely to fail (e.g., deep play).
lessons.safetyNotes: Never recall to end fun abruptly; keep recalls positive.

lessons.title: Handling & Grooming 2
lessons.objective: Comfort with gentle brushing and paw handling.
steps: Touch paw → treat. Lift paw briefly → treat.
Brush one stroke → treat; repeat a few times.
supportGuidelines: If fidgety: reduce duration; pair each touch with a treat.
lessons.safetyNotes: Never restrain forcefully; watch for stress signals.
